website_summaries.verdict: A convenient and inexpensive classwork organizer.
pros: Slots are large enough to hold books but also could hold papers or folders
Reinforced plastic labels help keep you organized
Recyclable and made of recycled materials
cons: Some owners say it was difficult to put together

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit for 9 x 12 paper
customer_reviews.text: This product did not go together very easily. Additionally, it was stated that it would hold 9 x 12 construction paper, I don't feel that it holds this size paper well. Was disappointed as I thought it would really help me organize construction paper in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: SharksFan23

customer_reviews.title: A few thoughts
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't come with instructions so fold carefully because it's a pain if you accidentally bend something that ought not to be bent. This also makes it look like you can put the labels on the front of the pockets but they are thinner and rounded so they just pop right off. I can bend them around it but it's not nearly as pretty and they pop off. So you have to put them on the bottom of the shelf at the front - which works as long but again - isn't as pretty as the one in the picture. So it's worth it over wood, but its a really tight fit and not exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: HTM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool box
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Hopefully sturdy enough. Needed to keep homeschool materials organized. just the right size. We Covered with contact paper for a different pattern and color.
customer_reviews.author: Operalover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to get one of these for my classroom for years, but could never afford the cost through most school oriented websites. This one is excellent quality at a very affordable price. I'm very happy with how sturdy it is, and how easy it was to assemble. I may even buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: macuser

customer_reviews.title: Banker's Shelves
customer_reviews.text: The open box was missing half of the overall set. I would have opened it sooner but have been busy with storms and personal obligations or I would have discovered the issue sooner and been able to return it or get another 15 shelf sent.
customer_reviews.author: Vixen Goldie

customer_reviews.title: VERY CHEAP HARD TO PUT TOGETHER
customer_reviews.text: This was so hard to put together and has no written instructions at all. It’s JUST pictures and only about 4-6 pictures. It’s cheap looking because some of the parts won’t bend properly and it’s made out of cardboard that you have to bend into shape.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as stated. It is very easy to assemble. It is made of cardboard so probably won't last as long in my classroom as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdier than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these types of products this year and these two made by banker's box are much sturdier!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and good looking paper organizer. The instruction is just pictures but I could figure it out. It is a great product! The paper is placed in vertical Direction.
customer_reviews.author: laszlovna

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This is surprisingly a wonderfully large size for everything my kid needs for school organization. At the same time it doesn't feel like it is too large to fit on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Waliser

customer_reviews.title: best for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bars that hold the names come off a little easy and it took me a bit to figure out how it all went together, but once set up, it was fairly sturdy and holds up well against less than gentle kids.
customer_reviews.author: luke rowley

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, poor construction, missing parts, no way to contact seller. Do not waste your money or your time.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Alright quality.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it’s worth the price you pay. But it was fairly easy to assemble and will do what it is intended to do in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece, can't contact manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Missing a piece and the company's website has no 'contact us' other than Facebook (I don't have a FB account) and Twitter.
customer_reviews.author: Cramer in Milwaukee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my chaotic desk
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love it. I was worried it might not be sturdy but it is full of papers and all sorts of stuff and sting as an ox
customer_reviews.author: seahorse

customer_reviews.title: Not made for construction paper
customer_reviews.text: This is great for standard sized paper, but construction paper is difficult to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Jen F.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble assembling the organizer. After putting it together it was very sturdy and organized all my music.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddler47

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Received product well but was missing pieces. Want to receive the missing parts as everything else was in good shape, but no way to request missing parts be shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Frances A Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but it was ripped when I got it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item, but when I got it, there was a small section that had a tear in it. It is sturdier than I thought it was going to be. I will package it up and send it back. :( Just wish it wasn't ripped. I really needed it for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our papers in the Sunday School crafts room. Thy fit in our cabinets and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Circlecnp

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete purchase
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the clips to attach the 2 parts on the sides and I did not receive 5 black slats that attach in the front!
customer_reviews.author: aryder14

customer_reviews.title: Good size and $
customer_reviews.text: The size was just what I wanted my teacher friend 💖
customer_reviews.author: isabel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! It's very useful and helps me stay organized. I didn't assemble it, so I'm not sure how easier or difficult that is.
customer_reviews.author: Loisbet Castro

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, sturdy, the size seems okay. Wish it could fit actual folders in the cubbies but overall pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: David King

customer_reviews.title: Blue paper sorter
customer_reviews.text: Great for sorting papers, not really for heavy or thick books-- will warp under heavy pressure
customer_reviews.author: Chelle dimples

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: It came missing one of the black plastic bars to go across the mailbox and I cannot figure out how to get in contact with someone to send an additional one. It is suppose to come with 4 and this specific one only came with 3.
customer_reviews.author: Alli H.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by the sturdiness!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the sturdiness of this organizer. I use it in my classroom to prepare worksheets/activities/games by the day. This was a great purchase and I think that it will really hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Gautreaux

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to use as a drying rack for my class & so I covered it with clear contact paper abs it is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Doesn’t take to much space. It’s sturdy and incredibly helpful in the office/school setting.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita Romero

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: The mailbox is great. Only down side was that the package was missing one of the black plastic channels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Fits in my cabinet at school and holds my colored paper. Easy to assemble. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Flores

customer_reviews.title: Cute but missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: These banker boxes are really cute, but the instructions were definitely difficult to understand, and our box came with a piece missing. That said, I’m excited to see how they’ll hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Loved mine! Just only fits about one package of paper in a compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and design...sturdy and enough shelves for each subject...alitte over priced but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ebeny

customer_reviews.title: Great for any classroom.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that my students are able to get things in and out of the slots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Takes some time to build but everything worked out as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Missing a shelf l Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Products arrived missing a piece to make 4th shelf. Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of separation for organization
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I recovered it with washi tape and he uses it in his office for putting various daily shipments in so he knows who is where. It looked like a classroom art project holder til we taped it to logistics office utility style. Everything fits now, great buy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Clark

customer_reviews.title: No support at back of shelf
customer_reviews.text: Will not work in this orientation or flat. Back of each slot sags with more than a few sheets of paper as there is no way to support the back of each shelf. Will not work for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Mert

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for use in the classroom. The included stickers were nice to get labels. After a year, they are still holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Really helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to help organize my VERY unorganized 11 year old for her homeschool subjects. This is PERFECT. It's sturdy, the labels are super helpful and not so deep you can't see what's in the slot.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Johnston

product_meta.title: Bankers Box Classroom 15 Compartment Literature Organizer, Single (3384301)
product_meta.description: Size:15 SlotNew larger sized slots accomodate the classroom need of keeping all students' work centralized in one area. Easy crashlock assembly . Stores protects and organizes materials, assignments and art supplies. Premium multi-layer construction with labels (included) for quick identification. Contains 60% recycled content. Packed 1 per carton.
feature_bullets: Larger-sized slots keep all students' work neatly centralized (2-1/2"H x 9-1/8"W x 12"D)
Easy crashlock assembly - just open and done!
Place included labels on reinforced, plastic channels to quickly identify each slot
Stores, protects and organizes materials and assigments in one, compact space (12-3/4"H x 28-1/2"W x 12-3/8"D)
Premium, multi-layer corrugated construction contains 60% recycled content and is 100% recyclable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars183 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
